title: From Resolution to Routine: The Small-Step Method for Lasting Change
partialText: Written by: Dr. Gunvor M. Dyrdal As a psychologist I meet a lot of people, and recently I’ve seen many of them make New Year’s resolutions. Most of them don´t have one thing they want to change – they have many. They want to change not only their routines, but their body, career, relationships, and […]

title: Opera Neon automatically suggests the right AI agent for you
partialText: Opera Neon introduces Intelligent mode: it automatically detects and suggest the best AI agent for your query.

title: Set sail with Opera GX: Claim your exclusive World of Warships rewards!
partialText: Opera GX is joining forces with Wargaming to bring the naval battles of World of Warships directly to your browser. Whether you are a seasoned Admiral or a landlubber looking to start your journey, we’ve prepared a giveaway to help you dominate the high seas. Opera GX users can now claim exclusive loot bundles to […]

title: Llama and QWEN – New LLMs to choose from in Opera Neon
partialText: Opera Neon is getting new AI models from the Llama and Qwen families, giving you more options to choose from in your AI browser.

title: Opera One R3 arrives with new AI, Google integrations, and more
partialText: We're presenting Opera One R3, the latest version of our flagship browser that comes packed with new tab features, rebuilt AI, and more.

title: Opera Neon becomes available in public early access
partialText: Starting today, Opera Neon enters a public early access stage. You don't need an invite code anymore, and everyone can subscribe!

title: Opera AI comes to Opera One, Opera GX, and Opera Air
partialText: Opera AI comes to Opera One, Opera GX, and Opera Air Last month we started a gradual rollout of Opera AI to our flagship desktop browser, Opera One. Taking the place of Aria, our completely rebuilt browser AI – which is accountless and free – is now available to all users of Opera One, Opera […]

title: Opera Air adds Winter Boost in time for the holidays
partialText: Hey all, It’s been a busy year at Opera! In February we launched Opera Air – the first browser with mindfulness at its core. Backed by the passionate and growing Air community, we’ve been steadily updating our mindful browser ever since. So before we close out 2025, we wanted to look back at where we […]

title: Opera upgrades the AI experience for its Android users
partialText: Today we’re bringing an update to Opera for Android that improves the user experience and allows you to use websites as well as images as context for your AI queries. Opera for Android’s AI capabilities are now becoming closer to those of our flagship browser for desktop, Opera One, providing a more consistent experience across […]

title: Opera GX gets new AI update
partialText: We’ve been hard at work rebuilding and refining the AI in Opera GX to give you a smoother, more efficient experience. Our updated AI is faster, smarter, and ready to assist you. Improved UI:  We’ve redesigned the AI’s access point, so now you’ll find a sleek, new “AI” button in the top right corner of […]
